name: findTasks
description: This tool is helpful when user want to find tasks by attributes.

attributes.name: taskPriority
attributes.description: Priority of a task. Valid values for this attribute: low, normal, high, exception

attributes.name: taskState
attributes.description: State of the task. Valid values for this attribute: open, in progress, done

name: findCases
description: This tool is helpful when user want to find cases by attributes.

attributes.name: caseState
attributes.description: State of the case. Valid values for this attribute: open, done, destroyed
